title: Rankings
body: Hey so I started solo/duo que last season and made bronze and sorta just gave up lol, but I have been playing a lot of flex que this season and was wondering, If I make silver rank on flex que but am bronze rank on solo/duo which ranking will show up? And by show up I mean like boarders and the little rank icon that pops up if you hover on someones name. Any helps great, Thanks for your time. {{champion:427}}

replies.body:
The border that should up will be solely from season 6 results, and based on which queue you join during season 7 (which hasn't started yet).  Per our [preseason FAQ,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231832207-Preseason-FAQ) here are the borders that will appear based on your queue:

Ranked Solo/Duo - 2016 Dynamic Queue
Ranked Flex 5v5 - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 5s (not available until Patch 6.23)
Ranked Flex 3v3 - 2016 Ranked 3s (not available until Patch 6.23)
Normal Summoner's Rift - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 5s
Normal Twisted Treeline - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 3s
Co-op vs. AI Summoner's Rift - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 5s
Co-op vs. AI Twisted Treeline - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 3s
Custom - Best of any 2016 queue
Rotating Game Modes - Best of any 2016 queue
ARAM 5v5 - Best of any 2016 queue

Hope that helps!  Good luck in the next season!
